title: Never disturb the dead - Island of the Dead 2000 - Horror film - Directed by Tim Southam

sources.title: Never disturb the dead - Island of the Dead 2000 - Horror film - Directed by Tim Southam
sources.description:
New York's haunting Hart Island becomes ground zero for a chilling outbreak!
When a developer's ambitious plans disturb Hart Island - home to a million unclaimed souls - a detective with a personal connection to the dead uncovers a terrifying secret. As a mysterious affliction spreads, unlikely allies must survive the night against unexpected threats.

Directed by Tim Southam
Screenplay by Peter Koper

ðŸŒŸ Starring:
Malcolm McDowell (A Clockwork Orange) - ruthless developer Rupert King
Talisa Soto (Mortal Kombat) - Detective Melissa O'Keefe
Mos Def (The Hitchhiker's Guide) - Guard Robbie J.
Bruce Ramsay - Roger
Steffen Wink - Tony
Kent McQuaid - Neely
Paul Hopkins - Medical Examiner
Tyrone Benskin - Warden


Did You Know?
Hart Island is an actual potter's field near NYC where over 1 million people rest - making this thriller eerily grounded in reality!
